case_address_found_1: Colorado River north of Avi Casino
case_circumstances: 911 was contacted by an unknown person reporting a body floating in the Colorado River, north of the Avi Casino.  The body was recovered from the river by the Fort Mojave Fire Department.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_with_body: A black jacket and striped shirt accompany the body. The black jacket demonstrates a monogram name "LEE" on the front of the jacket. The jacket has a "HARTWELL" label and is a size large. The shirt has a "MADISON AVENUE" label and is a large.
case_footwear: A discolored sock and white tennis shoe is present on the left foot. The white tennis shoes has the word "POWER" on the leather uppers and the word "TUNNEL" on the rubbery heels.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
